title: Mary Prince on enslavement - authors purpose

content.question: Which of the following best describes the most likely intended purpose of the source?

choices.label: To contrast positive plantation environments with negative ones
To criticize enslaved mothers who abandoned their children
To advance the political cause of abolition
To stress the importance of direct action to combat slavery

content.answer: To advance the political cause of abolition

topic.text: 2.22: Gender and Resistance in Slave Narratives

skill.text: 2.B: Describe a source's perspective, purpose, context, and audience.
